revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Broadsoft |model=Micro Appliance |revision=PI-150 (PI-03347) |asin=B01K3760KS |manuf_country=USA |is_manuf=No |manuf=Patton Electronics |manuf_model=PI-03347 |manuf_rev=REV G |est_release_date=08/2016 |pcb_id=01-PI03347G |type=VoIP gateway |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=AM3352;AM3352BZCZ60, 7AAXLTW GI, 962B ZCZ; |cpu1_cspeed=600 |fla1=64 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S25FL512SAIFG1 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Alliance Memory |ram1_model=AS4C64M16D2B-25BCN |serial=yes,, 3-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (19200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6172 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=2 |addl_chips=8-Kbit Serial I2C EEPROM;STMicro;M24C08;;1;,,, Power Management IC for SoCs;TI;TPS650250;;1;,,, Low-power Dual-Voltage Comparator;STMicro;LM393;;1;,,, 18V 2A Step-Down Switching Regulator;Semtech;SC4524F;;1;,,, 2A 1.5MHz PWM Step-Down Switching Regulator;STMicro;ST1S09;;2; |stock_boot=U-Boot;2013.01;bacchus_large-7; |stock_os=Linux;3.2; |default_ip=192.168.100.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui_eth=00:55:DA }} {{TagLine|Broadsoft PI-150 Micro Appliance}}
"PATTON ELECTRONICS", "MODEL PI-03347", and "03347FA-001 REV G" :are silkscreened on board top. "P/N: 01-PI03347G" is silkscreened on board bottom.
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Texas Instruments]] AM3352 :[[ARM]] (Cortex-A8) @600MHz *Storage: 64MB Serial (NOR) Flash *Memory: 128MB (DDR2) SDRAM *Network: 3x Gigabit Ethernet port *Power: 12V/2A via barrel plug
==Images== <gallery> File:Broadsoft PI-150 Top.jpeg|Board top File:Broadsoft PI-150 Bottom.jpeg|Board bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
